name: Ultimate Custom Night's Basics (Baldi's Basics Pre Mod)
name_original: Ultimate Custom Night's Basics (Baldi's Basics Pre Mod)
description:
Story: It has just turned 12 AM and you have arrived at the Ultimate Custom Night School to learn about FNAF. What they didn't
tell you is that the animatronics there activate at 12 AM and Funtime Foxy will try to kill you... To win and get out at 6AM,
you must collect all 7 fnaf items, which are in rooms showing different fnaf games, avoid Funtime Foxy's friends (they will try
to stop you), and get to all 4 exits before leaving at 6AM!!! Easy, right? No, it will be hard, but i know you can do it, so win!

Newest Current Version is Pre-Release v0.9, Download it today!

PS: This is the offical pre-release version! Full version coming soon...
